Package com.linecorp.armeria.server

Interface HttpService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHttpService, AbstractUnaryGrpcService, GrpcService, HttpFileService, HttpHealthCheckService, JettyService, ManagedHttpHealthCheckService, PrometheusExpositionService, RedirectService, THttpService, TomcatService
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
    @FunctionalInterface
public interface HttpService
extends Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>
    An HTTP/2 Service.

    This interface is merely a shortcut to Service<HttpRequest, HttpResponse> at the moment.
